name: They Are More
description:
Inspired from Baba Is You-[MORE] mechanic, and Exit The Gungeon. Enjoy!

Note: Music might not loop on browser, consider downloading exe file

[Controls]
WASD-Move
Mouse Hold-Fire

[Used Programs]
Unity Engine
Aseprite
FL Studio
